posts.post_content:
I would like to trade the following cards for Johnny Evers cards(non T206)...would also consider trading for other cards if there is one you need, but don't have any
Evers cards available. Feel free to send a trade offer [url]mhgt@embarqmail.com[/url]

Thanks
Mike

Ames-nice card, no creases
[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/mhgt/hoft206/mycollection/websize/T206-Ames%20portrait.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/mhgt/hoft206/mycollection/websize/Bresnahan-Kotton.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/mhgt/hoft206/mycollection/websize/Merkle-Hindu%202.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/mhgt/hoft206/mycollection/websize/McGraw-T205.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/mhgt/hoft206/mycollection/websize/T206-Nichols-American%20Beauty.jpg[/IMG]
Pattee-reverse shows part of another back
[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/mhgt/hoft206/mycollection/websize/Pattee.jpg[/IMG]
Schulte-wrinkle in rt border above head
[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/mhgt/hoft206/mycollection/websize/Schulte-Front%20View.jpg[/IMG]
I dig the Merkle and would be interested in it. I wrote you a short note about it. Thank you.

[quote name="DerekMichael" post=1025070]I dig the Merkle and would be interested in it. I wrote you a short note about it. Thank you.[/QUOTE]

Hi Derek
I did not receive your message.

Mike
nice cards, Mike...a little something for everyone!!!!!!!
Sorry! Allow me to try that again. Thank you.
